__e: You'd better eat well tonight you don't want to be sick on the train.
For God doth know that in the day ye eat thereof then your eyes shall be opened and ye shall be as gods knowing good and evil.
General, what do you eat when there is no war to go to?
She knows what time we dine – and why are you two eating so quickly?
Mom-Mom's making dinner, so you eat whatever it is that she makes you.
But first... eat, drink, laugh well on this day.
- So eat, drink, and be merry, and tomorrow I suggest you have yourselves a little wolf hunt.
Eat and drink, there's plenty of everything.
You boys eat your vegetables or I'll do the same to you.
Eat your motherfucking ice cream... because we're about to deliver some serious freedom through their skulls.
Children... finish your ice-creams and I'll show you to your bedrooms.
Come on, eat up before everything gets cold.
Everyone finish and back to work.
Don't get too fat or they'll eat you.
Don't load up. I got a surprise for you.
Don't eat too many. I put rum in the batter.
